actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to provide for uniform expiration dates for agreements in the longshore and maritime industries in the States of Washington, Oregon, and California.

summary.text: Sets forth uniform expiration dates for agreements in the longshore and maritime industries in the States of Washington, Oregon, and California, with three-year periods between such expiration dates.

titles.title: A bill to provide for uniform expiration dates for agreements in the longshore and maritime industries in the States of Washington, Oregon, and California.
